-- DaoShippers_D2_Select -- 2013/1/10 日立 太郎 SELECT [ShipperID], [CompanyName], [Phone] FROM [Shippers]
WHERE AND [ShipperID] = @ShipperIDAND [ShipperID] IS NULL AND [ShipperID] LIKE @ShipperID_Like AND [CompanyName] = @CompanyNameAND [CompanyName] IS NULL AND [CompanyName] LIKE @CompanyName_Like AND [Phone] = @PhoneAND [Phone] IS NULL AND [Phone] LIKE @Phone_Like
